description:
Locked in battle with the Saiyans, Goku gives Nappa a brutal demonstration of the training he received from King Kai. Broken and defeated, Nappa must now face the ferocious wrath of Vegeta!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Papai você é incrível! Uma técnica mortal chamada Kaioh-ken
Tousan Sugee ya! Kyuukyoku no Hissatsuwaza Kaiouken
พ่อจ๋ายอดไปเลย สุดยอดท่าไม้ตาย หมัดเจ้าพิภพ
父さんすげぇや! 究極の必殺技・界王拳
